episodes.title: When Mentors Become Tormentors || The Lighthouse Group, the UK Cult in your Neighbourhood
episodes.description:
Fear, manipulation, a horrendous abuse of trust, and another case of data protection being used as an excuse - just some of the shocking stories unearthed by the BBC about the Lighthouse International Group. 

How a group offering life coaching to entrepreneurs in the UK failed its members in the worst way, and took over their lives, and their money, showing itself to be a cult.

This story of the cult that could be hiding in plain sight in your neighbourhood hits home hard for me for a number of reasons, including the location. It really is too close to home for comfort!

Outro music: 'The Moonlight and Me' by The Tap Room, Epidemic Sound (via Canva Pro Content License) https://www.epidemicsound.com/artists/the-tap-room/ 

The BBC reporting on the Lighthouse International Group, lead by Catrin Nye is fantastic. Check it out here:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-65175712.amp

https://www.bbc.co.uk/sounds/brand/m001kvf8?partner=uk.co.bbc&origin=share-mobile

www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/episode/m001krb2

#LighthouseInternationalGroup #LighthouseCult #Entrepreneurship #LifeCoaching #AVeryBritishCult #BBC #Privacy #DataProtection #GDPR #Cult #UKCult #CultSurvivors #Manipulation
